document_data.mainbody:
Fala Lefaliir () was a wood elf herbalist in Waterdeep in the late 15 century DR.
Fala had long, braided hair.
Fala had an outgoing personality. Like Falas patron deity Corellon Larethian, Fala was neither male nor female and requested to be referred to by name or by the pronoun "they".
Fala was an herbalist and potion seller in Trollskull Alley in the North Ward and a member of the Guild of Apothecaries and Physicians. Falas shop was known as Corellons Crown, a three-story building on Trollskull Alley whose third floor had been converted into a greenhouse with glass walls that allowed passers-by to see a variety of multicolored flowers inside.
Fala was a friend of the Zhentarim agent Ziraj, who once saved Falas life. Fala kept a room open on the second floor of the shop for Ziraj and his occasional visits.
Fala was an eyewitness to the detonation of the fireball on Trollskull Alley in . The blast broke some of the greenhouses windows, but no one in the building was injured.
